TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DiscoveryDocumentReference extends System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference

Docs.summary: Represents a reference to a discovery document. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available XML Web services given an URL. The URL typically points to a discovery document, which usually has a.disco file name extension. The discovery document contains references to information about the existance of XML Web services, such as Service Descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas, or other discovery documents. This class represents a reference to a discovery document.
## Examples [!code-cpp[DiscoveryDocumentReference_ctor_WriteDocument#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryDocumentReference_ctor_WriteDocument/CPP/discoverydocumentreference_ctor_writedocument.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DiscoveryDocumentReference_ctor_WriteDocument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryDocumentReference_ctor_WriteDocument/CS/discoverydocumentreference_ctor_writedocument.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryDocumentReference_ctor_WriteDocument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryDocumentReference_ctor_WriteDocument/VB/discoverydocumentreference_ctor_writedocument.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the discovery document has not been downloaded and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>, an attempt to download and resolve the document is made.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the reference to a discovery document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For most references, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A> property is a URL, such as http://www.contoso.com/MyWebService.disco.

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Resolve(string contentType, class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ResolveAll() cil managed

Docs.summary: Verifies that all referenced documents within the discovery document are valid.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Unless you specifically need to resolve the individual references of a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> object, you should invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol>.
This method resolves all references to discovery documents, XSD schemas, and Service Descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> and any references found in referring discovery documents.
## Examples [!code-csharp[DiscoveryDocumentReference_Document_ResolveAll#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryDocumentReference_Document_ResolveAll/CS/ddreference_document_resolveall.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryDocumentReference_Document_ResolveAll#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryDocumentReference_Document_ResolveAll/VB/ddreference_document_resolveall.vb#2)]

-or-
